sentences.sContent: Teachers have no choice but to take measures to protect themselves.
sentences.sCn: 教师们别无选择，只能采取措施来保护自己。

sentences.sContent: Our neighbours have just bought themselves a jacuzzi.
sentences.sCn: 我们邻居刚刚买了一个按摩浴缸。

sentences.sContent: The kids seem very pleased with themselves.
sentences.sCn: 那些孩子好像自得其乐。

trans.tranOther: used to show that the people who do something are affected by their own action
